name: MG[+SpIC_mrg] v.E
description: A partial rewrite for E. Stabler's top-down beam parser for minimalist grammar with extra condition preventing multiple movements from specifiers. See Stabler (2012) Two models of minimimalist, incremental, syntactic analysis. http://www.linguistics.ucla.edu/people/stabler/Stabler12-2models.pdf , and https://github.com/jpurma/mgtdb
author: Jukka Purma
